description: Installation of plant including kitchen extract and supply ducts, two ancillary extract fans and seven AC units housed within an acoustic enclosure, and a refrigeration condenser unit on the rear roof at ground floor level, associated with the basement, ground, and first floor commercial unit (retrospective).
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Plans: Location Plan; E01 Rev-A; P02 Rev-C; P03 Rev-A; P04 Rev-B; TFP-1037-201-B; TFP-1037-201 Rev H-AF. 

Supporting documents: Dynamic Simulation of Lisboeta Restaurant (HIBEC Ltd, 04/03/2025); Plant Noise Impact Assessment (NSL, 20/09/2024); Odour Management and Cleaning Statement; HVAC Specification; Halton Pollustop Brochure; Halton Extractor Fan Brochure. 

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
Condition : 2 - The external noise level emitted from plant, machinery or equipment at the development hereby approved shall be lower than the typical existing background noise level by at least 10dBA, or by 15dBA where the source is tonal, as assessed according to BS4142:2014 at the nearest and/or most affected noise sensitive premises, with all machinery operating together at maximum capacity. 

All noise mitigation be implemented in accordance with the details set out within the Plant Noise Impact Assessment (prepared by Noise Solutions Limited, dated 20/09/2024) and thereafter be permanently retained.

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the area generally in accordance with the requirements of policies A1 and A4 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
Condition : 3 - The installation, operation, and maintenance of the odour abatement equipment and extract system, shall be in accordance with the 'EMAQ+Control of Odour and Noise from Commercial Kitchen Exhaust Systems" and the Odour Management and Cleaning Statmeent, and thereafter be permanently retained.

Reason: To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site/ surrounding premises is not adversely affected by cooking odour in accordance with the requirements of policies A1 and A4 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017
